Title: Supply concerns, high prices push Asian LNG buyers to seek more long-term LNG
Description: Concerns over persisting supply tightness and high LNG prices over the next few years have pushed Asian LNG buyers to sign more long-term contracts, with this increasing the momentum for new liquefaction projects to be sanctioned.
Author: CK

Title: RWE signs initial deal for 15-year term supply with Sempra for 2.25 mtpa from Port Arthur
Description: Germany’s energy firm RWE has signed a heads of agreement to buy 2.25 mtpa of LNG over a 15-year term from US infrastructure developer Sempra’s proposed Port Arthur LNG project in  Texas.
Author: CK
